resources.string: This service regularly sends the device\'s location to the Telegram FriendLocation Bot.

1. Select the time interval at which to send your location.


2. Type in your username. If you are using this app with Telegram, type in either your Telegram username, if you have one, or your first name as shown in the Telegram app.


3. Type in the IP address of the server receiving your location. The default is "archoniii.ddns.net".


4. Enable the "Send location" toggle button to start sending your location at the selected time interval. You can close the app and the service will continue to run in the background. To disable it, open the app and disable the "Send location" toggle button.
